results.selector: #container > b > b > b > strong > strong > footer > div:nth-child(4) > a

results.selector: #container > b > b > b > strong > strong > footer > div:nth-child(4) > a

results.message: Ensure that the img element's alt text serves the same purpose and presents the same information as the image.
results.selector: #container > b > b > b > strong > strong > footer > div:nth-child(4) > a > img

results.message: If this image cannot be fully described in a short text alternative, ensure a long text alternative is also available, such as in the body text or through a link.
results.selector: #container > b > b > b > strong > strong > footer > div:nth-child(4) > a > img

results.message: Link elements can only be located in the head section of the document.
